# error

**Instance Property**

An error in the top-level encode.

## Declaration

```swift
var error: (any Error)? { get }
```

## Discussion

The meaning of this property depends on the setting of the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCoder/decodingFailurePolicy-swift.property] property. For [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCoder/DecodingFailurePolicy-swift.enum/raiseException], this property is always `nil`. For [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCoder/DecodingFailurePolicy-swift.enum/setErrorAndReturn], a non-`nil` value represents the first error encountered while decoding the archive.

## Managing Decode Errors

- **failWithError(_:)**: Signals to this coder that the decode operation has failed.

items.description: Signals to this coder that the decode operation has failed.
